name: Phoenix Reborn
description:
Someone said once:  "A human, who ate a phoenix becomes so powerful, that he could break the world". Stupid people have started a hunt. All of the phoenixes flew away... All except the weakest one.

A little phoenix tries to reach out to the parent`s paw to fly to the distant planet of the phoenixes.

Help him using your cursor and pressing left button to dash, when the red scale is not empty.

// Made in 3 days to #OneScriptJam , it`s my 4th game
